snippet: As many species facing extinction have waited for years to be protected by the United States, the Fish and Wildlife Service has pledged to decide the fates of all the backlogged candidates by 2018.
lead_paragraph: As many species facing extinction have waited for years to be protected by the United States, the Fish and Wildlife Service has pledged to decide the fates of all the backlogged candidates by 2018.

headline.main: Threatened Species Have a Chance for Protection
